column4: Just thought of this. if say I bought a new computer and i placed this HDD into the new tower. would it still work? or is it like windows and won't
If it was hda in the first machine, most likely it would boot, and you'd get at least a console
otherwise you'd need to boot a live cd, and edit /boot/grub/menu.lst and /etc/fstab , and check /etc/X11/xorg.conf
